
h1. eXo Spaces



h1. Basic Concepts

*# space* is an environment where people can interact with others who have the same interest, who do in the same project or in the same company, etc. A space provides different applications.

*eXo Spaces* add communities to your works and relations. It allows regrouping people by interests or projects easily. It leverages any existing application such as Portlets or Gadgets to enable a collaborative work.


*# space manager* is a user with special rights within a space. He can manage the members list, configure and install applications. When a user creates a space, he automatically becomes the manager of this space.
